name: Day/ Holiday Camps
description: At the Mission St. location - 2285 Mission St. - Regular Hours: 9:30 am - 4:30 pm. - Extended Care hours: early care 8:30 - 9:30 am/ after care 4:30 - 5:30 pm. Available on select dates, for an additional fee. - Open to kids 4 years & 9-months-old to 11 years old. ​ Holiday/Day Camps Cost: $130 per regular day, per child. Extended care: additional $15 per day, per child for early care. $5 discount for siblings with Coupon Code "HERMAN@S" Week-long Camps Cost: $585 for 5 days of regular day hou
